confirmationPeriodms.title: Confirmation Period (ms)
confirmationPeriodms.description: In order to monitor accessory responsiveness automatically, enter the time (in milliseconds) to wait after publishing a 'set' topic to receive a confirmatary 'get' topic update. The accessory must echo messages it receives through the 'setOn' subject to the 'getOn' subject, otherwise homebridge-mqttthing will mark it as unresponsive and republish on the 'setOn' subject.

retryLimit.title: Confirmation Retry Limit
retryLimit.description: When using confirmation period, configure the number of publishing retries attempted by homebrige-mqttthing when no confirmatory 'get' topic update is received.

confirmationIndicateOffline.title: Confirmation Indicate Offline
confirmationIndicateOffline.description: Indicate offline ('No Response') when confirmation message not received

integerValue.title: Use integer values (1 and 0) instead of 'true' and 'false'
integerValue.description: Use integer values 1 and 0 to represent on and off for Boolean values, instead of the default 'true' and 'false'. Alternatively specific values may be specified using 'onValue' and 'offValue'.

onValue.description: Value to use to represent an 'on' or 'triggered' state (optional). Takes precedence over 'integerValue'.

offValue.description: Value to use to represent an 'off' or 'not triggered' state (optional). Takes precedence over 'integerValue'.

otherValueOff.description: When 'onValue' and 'offValue' are configured, also treat any unrecognized received values as 'off'

history.title: Enable History service for Eve App (optional)

size.title: History Size
size.description: Maximum size of stored data points (default: 4032)

noAutoRepeat.title: History No Auto-repeat
noAutoRepeat.description: Disable repetition of last value if no data was received in last 10min interval

mergeInterval.title: History Merge Interval (minutes)
mergeInterval.description: Set merge interval (in minutes) for events, which are very close in time (not in combination with autoTimer/autoRepeat)

persistencePath.title: History Persistence Path
persistencePath.description: Full path of directory in which to store history data (defaults to homebridge user storage path)

resetStateAfterms.title: Reset After
resetStateAfterms.description: Milliseconds after which to reset state automatically (optional)

turnOffAfterms.title: Turn Off After
turnOffAfterms.description: Milliseconds after which to turn off automatically (optional)

hex.title: Use Hexadecimal
hex.description: Format combined RGB/RGBW/RGBWW in hexadecimal (e.g. 'FFA000') instead of as comma-separated decimals (e.g. '255,160,0').

hexPrefix.description: Format combined RGB/RGBW/RGBWW in hexadecimal with specified prefix (typically '#') instead of as comma-separated decimals.

warmWhite.title: Warm White Colour
warmWhite.description: In RGBWW mode, RGB value of warm white in format red,green,blue (optional)

coldWhite.title: Cold White Colour
coldWhite.description: In RGBWW mode, RGB value of cold white in format red,green,blue (optional)
